title: Flock of beetle girls
description: A flock of bug girls, I decided to combine 5 models in 1 pack, thereby lowering the total cost of these models
longDescription:
A more detailed description for each model will be added below in the link to the product already on display.

on all models, an epic skeleton was used with additional bones

  • Spider_woman_monster character for your game
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s6j-MR--lqE
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_yk9Mf3HCvo

Rigged to Epic skeleton ; extra bones : unrealjoint127_R, unrealjoint128_R, unrealjoint129_R, unrealjoint123_R, unrealjoint124_R, unrealjoint125_R, unrealjoint135_R, unrealjoint136_R, unrealjoint137_R, unrealjoint131_L, unrealjoint132_L, unrealjoint133_L, unrealjoint131_R, unrealjoint132_R, unrealjoint133_R, unrealjoint135_L, unrealjoint136_L, unrealjoint137_L, unrealjoint127_R1, unrealjoint128_R1, unrealjoint129_R1, unrealjoint123_R1, unrealjoint124_R1, unrealjoint125_R1

#3 - set texture

Animation #14 ; atak -3, atak_spell - 2, death - 2, idle - 2, impakt -2, jump -1, runinng - 1, walk -1

Vertex counts of characters: 17906

Texture Resolutions: (head 2048 bodi 4096) end bonus head end bodi 8K.

  • Scorpio girl
  • Demo
  • ue

In the project, there are 4 assembly options for the model, 2 of them have a face morph and the model is modular. The model is equipped with an epic skeleton with additional bones for the tail and hair, and 3 textures were also made for the model

Rigged to Epic skeleton; extra bones: unrealhair_1_1_M/unrealhair_2_1_M/unrealhair_3_1_M/unrealsting_1_M/unrealsting_2_M/unrealsting_3_M/unrealsting_4_M/unrealsting_5_M/unrealsting_6_M/unrealsting_7_M/unrealsting_8_M/unrealsting_9_M/unrealsting_10_M/unrealsting_11_M

Animation types (19/0):

Vertex counts of characters: 36071

Texture Resolutions: (head x 4096 bodi x 4096 armor x 4096 eyelashes x 1024)

  • Butterfly Woman
  • Demo
  • UE

in the model 2 options for the head and 4 options for a set of unique textures

Rigged to Epic skeleton: extra bones: wings_R_1,wings_R_2,wings_R_3,wings_R_4,wings_R_5,wings_R_6,wings_R_7,wings_R_8,wings_R_9,wings_L_1,wings_L_2,wings_L_3,wings_L_4,wings_L_5,wings_L_6,wings_L_7,wings_L_8,wings_L_9,tendril_L_1,tendril_L_2,tendril_L_3,tendril_L_4,tendril_L_5,tendril_R_1,tendril_R_2,tendril_R_3,tendril_R_4,tendril_R_5

Animation types (26/0):

Vertex counts of characters: bodi_1-17394; bodi_2-26238; wings-5936;

Texture Resolutions: (bodi x4096 headx2048 wings x2048)

  • Bee Girl
  • Demo
  • Ue

There are 3 basic grids in the project; 1. mesh of a humanoid bee ( girl ) with blend shapes.

2. mesh of a humanoid bee with a bee head

3. mesh of a humanoid bee without blendshapes ( girl ).

The project has 3 sets of unique textures

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Extra bones: wings_b_r_1,wings_b_r_2,wings_b_l_1,wings_b_l_2.

Animation types (26/0):

Vertex counts of characters: 34668

Texture Resolutions: (bodi x4096 head x2048)

  • Insect girl
  • Preview VIDEO

In model 3 of a set of unique textures, it is possible to replace the monster's head with the girl's head. The model can also remove the wings

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Extra bones: wingR3, wingR4, wingR5, wingR, wingR1, wingR2, wingL, wingL1, wingL2, wingL3, wingL4, wingL5, unrealJaw_M, tendrilR, tendrilR1, tendrilR2, tendrilR3, tendrilR4, tendrilR5, tendrilR6, tendrilR7, tendrilL, tendrilL1, tendrilL2, tendrilL3, tendrilL4, tendrilL5, tendrilL6, tendrilL7

Number of Animations: 21

Vertex counts of characters: 25227

Texture Resolutions: (bodi x4096 head x 4096 weapons x 2048)
